players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is a villager. She is trying to frame me to protect the real mafia."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of the unknown Alice? That seems suspicious."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is a villager. She is trying to frame me to protect the real mafia."
Diana: "I am the detective. Bob is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Bob out."
Charlie: "I trust Diana. Bob's claim to have investigated Diana doesn't make sense if he's the real detective. Vote Bob."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is a villager. She is trying to frame me to protect the real mafia."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of the unknown Alice? That seems suspicious."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is a villager. She is trying to frame me to protect the real mafia."
You: "I am the detective. Bob is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Bob out."
Charlie: "I trust Diana. Bob's claim to have investigated Diana doesn't make sense if he's the real detective. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
